New Records: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran added the second-highest opening stand in T20 World Cup history with 154 runs.
Fazalhaq Farooqi claimed a five-wicket haul in his T20I debut.
Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim Zadran's 154-run partnership was a standout performance.
Fazalhaq Farooqi's five-wicket haul was a key moment in the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Afghanistan's win was a significant achievement in their World Cup campaign.
Uganda showed resilience despite the loss.
